posts.text: WelcomeWelcome! This blog is powered by GitHub Pages and Hexo. This post is for testing purpose only. TestsBasic TestsTest History (Implementing Timeline) Test math formula: $a\in R_q$. Comments to quoted text FigureUse HTML <figure> tag to include a figure, instead of Markdown’s ![Apple HomePod](https://www.apple.com/v/home/do/images/promos/homepod_film_large.jpg "Apple HomePod") to provide better experience. Two different approaches to include figure Markdown Apple HomePod - 1 Code: 1![Apple HomePod - 1](https://www.apple.com/v/home/do/images/promos/homepod_film_large.jpg) HTMLApple HomePod - 2 Code: 1<figure class="image-bubble"><div class="img-lightbox"><div class="overlay"></div><img src="https://www.apple.com/v/home/do/images/promos/homepod_film_large.jpg" alt="image"></div><div class="image-caption">Apple HomePod - 2</div></figure> Card Style Test为了解决 Hexo 自定义页面slug为空不能很好的使用多说评论这个问题，现在已经给每个自定义页面自动生成了hexo-page-path这种格式的slug。本来准备用date做格式的最后一节，测试中发现 page 中的date值为修改时间，是动态的。综合考虑使用了路径path。以后可以根据需要添加更多模块支持。打赏和评论默认开启，可根据需要在 Markdown 头部定义是否关闭。 Useful CommandsClean, Generate and Initiate Local Server12$ hexo clean$ hexo g && hexo s Commit to GitHub1$ hexo d -m "Add commit message here"
